MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L10 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:31pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:36pm on the 13th October 2020.
